articles.title: Lionel Messi has found his Iniesta clone at Barcelona in teen sensation Pedri - Daily Mail
articles.description: PETE JENSON: Amid all the 'Pedrimania' the club's supporters are wondering if the teenager might save more than just the season. He could end up being the reason Lionel Messi stays at the club.
articles.content:
When Pedri became the youngest player to score and assist in the same La Liga game on Wednesday night aged just 18 years and 42 days the one who seemed to enjoy it most was Lionel Messi.

articles.author: David Anderson
articles.title: Sean Dyche makes Premier League coronavirus claim as Burnley boss details vaccination belief - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Burnley boss believes that the NHS would feel the benefit if Premier League stars were vaccinated in the immediate future and money used for testing pushed back into the vaccination system
articles.content:
Sean Dyche claims Premier League players should be vaccinated to protect the games integrity.
 Dyche revealed Burnley are the latest club to be hit by coronavirus.
